activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11133
activity.text:
Changes must be made in the OrganizationUsers.tsx component

There can be two solutions to this:
Breaking the name to the next line, i.e, wrapping the long words
Truncate the long names with ellipsis (...)
One more approach could be to truncate the name with ellipsis normally, and show the full name with wrapping on hover.
End Date: By end of tomorrow (10/03/25) or 1-2 Days after being assigned

 @rithviknishad @Jacobjeevan  I would like to work on this issue, please assign it to me
